title: Which sound sliders change what sounds?
body: So uhh, which sound sliders will change what sounds? I've tried experimenting with it but it's really confusing for me with so many sliders.

replies.body:
**Master:** Everything at once.
**Music:** The background music which can be set to the old or updated track, also applies to skins specific themes like the star guardian or dark star themes that play for some of those skins for the first minute or so.
**Announcer:** "Welcome to Summoner;s Rift", "Double Kill", "Ace" etc.
**Voice:** Champion voices, so jokes, laughs, etc.
**Sound FX:** Ability sounds.
**Ambience:** Flavour sounds like water when viewing river and bush rustlies.
**Pings:** Pings!
